name: Fade 2018
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Dive into the memory of a man and face the cataclysm that threaten to erase the identity of his world. Share his adventure in order to save what is dear to him.

Platform : PC
Engine : Unreal Engine 4
Number of players :1 

Producer : Théo BOULANGER-MARGUIER
Game Design : Antoine CAZAYUS, Marco MARESCA
Game Art : Geoffrey BERTRAND-GERBAUD, Sahra MEKHAEMAR, Yves PINEL
Game Programming : Rémi ANDROUIN, Vincent FOUQUET
Music & Sound Design : Aloïs DURUPT
